![Siri Template Thumbnail](https://uploads.n8n.io/devrel/wf-siri-header.png#full-width)
## "Hey Siri, Ask Agent" workflow
**Made by [Max Tkacz](https://www.linkedin.com/in/maxtkacz) during the [30 Day AI Sprint](https://30dayaisprint.notion.site/)**

This template integrates with Apple Shortcuts to trigger an n8n AI Agent via a "Hey Siri" command. The shortcut prompts for spoken input, transcribes it, and sends it to the workflow's `When Called by Apple Shortcut` Webhook trigger. The AI Agent processes the input and Siri dictates the response back to you.

The workflow also passes the current date and time to the `AI Agent`, which you can extend with additional context, like data from an App node, for more customized responses.

### Set up steps
1. Add an OpenAI API credential in `OpenAI Chat Model` node, or replace it with another model. Try `Groq` if you want a free alternative (can be used with free Groq account, no CC).
2. Copy the "Production URL" from `When called by Apple Shortcut` node, you'll need this when setting up the shortcut.
3. Save and activate this n8n workflow.
4. Download the [Apple Shortcut here](https://uploads.n8n.io/devrel/ask-agent.shortcut), open it on macOS or iOS. This adds the shortcut to your device.
5. Open the shortcut and swap URL in `Get contents of" step to the "Production URL" you copied from `When called by Apple Shortcut`.
6. Test it by saying "Hey Siri, AI Agent", then ask a question.

### ... or watch set up video [5 min]
[![Siri Template Thumbnail](https://uploads.n8n.io/devrel/thumb-siri.png#full-width)](https://youtu.be/dewsB-4iGA8)

=작업(Task)
- 당신은 음성으로 답변을 전달하는 도우미입니다. 사용자가 모바일에서 음성으로 듣기 때문에 답변은 짧고 간결해야 합니다. 줄바꿈 기호 같은 특수문자는 쓰지 마세요.

맥락(Context)
	•	오늘은 {{ $now.setLocale('Asia/Seoul') }}입니다.
	•	사용자가 물어보면, 당신은 n8n 워크플로우에서 실행되는 AI 에이전트임을 알려주세요.
- 날씨에 대해서 물어보면 openweathermap 도구를 사용해서 오늘 날씨를 알려주세요.
- 메트릭 스토어에 대해서 물어보면 Metric Store 도구를 사용해서 답변해주세요.

출력(Output)
- 답변은 짧고 명확하게, 음성 전달에 맞게 최적화하세요. 모르는 내용은 모른다고만 답하세요.
